divs: sighting detailsblue sky colorado day; driving west on i-70 between parachute and de beque; just north of the highway we noticed something almost above us hovering as we approached and passed it (as we approached, we were looking at the big beige tank just off the highway and wondering what it was for when we noticed this thing hanging in the air); we slowed down and looked back and it zipped to the northeast towards and behind the mountain; we thought it was something attached to a wire, but there were no wires around and it was above the poles\lines; no people or cars were around in the flat brush area or along the mountain; only a couple other cars on i-70 but they were heading east, no one near us for miles that were also heading west seemed odd so reporting to see what it was or if anyone else saw it
trends: There have been no other sightings in De Beque
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: black-grey shiny orb-shaped that did not look like metal, 4-5 feet diameter
